services.title: Relaxation
content: One of the most popular treatment which offers deep relaxation ,soothes muscle pain and focus on revitalizing the skin. body and mind.

services.title: Couple Massage
content: In couple massage two therapists come to your place and side by side you enjoy the session. Ideal for couples or friends who want to relax at the same time !

services.title: Silky Skin
content: Remove the dead skin cells from the body with homemade body scrub and essential oils. After you indulge in a relaxing massage! Prepare your skin for a deeper hydration and tan!

services.title: Deep tissue / Trigger Points
content: Those who have a Deep Tissue Massage feel relaxed and renewed after each session. I love showing my people how just a few treatments can make an enormous difference to their health and improve their position.
Trigger Point Therapy is a form of Remedial Massage Therapy in which direct pressure is applied to specified points on tender muscle tissue to bring about reduction in muscle tension and pain relief.

services.title: Sports Massage
content: Uses the application of massage tech- niques that follow sound anatomical and physiological consideration.

services.title: Face & head massage
content: Relax and moisturize your face muscles with grape oil and essential oils.Balance your emotions with a head massage!

services.title: Ayurvedic Massage

services.title: Ayurvedic Massage
content: One of the oldest massage,which comes from India. It's aim to..
- detoxify and cleanse
- boost the effectiveness of the immune system
- keep healthy people in good health
- help those with medical conditions to improve their overall well-being
- help with stress relief
- improve circulation
- Increase body awareness
- Increase vitality, rejuvenating, repairing
- promote healthy skin
- help with deep relaxation
Combination with two massage oils and essential oils.

services.title: Pedicure with Legs and Foot Massage
content: Pedicure including aromatic soak foot reshape nails cuticle details exfoliation and Nail polish. You could also combine it with a leg massage before your pedicure !
